attributes.action: not approve the installation of the anti-missile shield in this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain is already host to American bases and listening stations etc. The siting of this anti-missile shield station with the ability to launch rockets will just make this country an even bigger target, in view of the country's participation in the war in both Iraq and Afghanistan.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
